ComicInfo.Title: The Interconnectedness of All Kings, Part 1: Schrödinger's Copycat
ComicInfo.Summary:
An all-new comic series based on Douglas Adams’ beloved holistic detective! Dirk arrives in San Diego to face a new country, new cases and new threats: reincarnation, for starters…!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tony Akins (a) & Paul Mounts (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Rob Guillory | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Robert Hack (a) & Stephen Downer (c) | 3 | Note: The indicia for this issue does not include an issue number even though it is advertised as a mini-series.
